modName: male_1 body FOR ARMOR MODS or REFERENCE

descriptionHtml:
This is a REFERENCE file I recreated and retopo\'d(not with detail intended, mostly form and size).
This is an OBJ file; the original male body has no pelvis other than a loin cloth and the body parts were not welded.

 This is ideal for creating armors/clothing. This has not been unwrapped or given uv\'s - it was intended as a reference mesh for people who want to model closely to the body (e.i. zbrush).

The number of polys is 30k, it was not intended to be lower or higher, just something basic to use for reference.

REMEMBER: this is only for male_1, you will still need to resize your meshes to fit male_0\'s thin frame. I will not be recreating male_0\'s mesh as this is more than enough to get started.

Leave a comment/Endorse if this helped make life easier on the modding front for male armors.
author: ViLeDeth
